title: ‘Your success is our success,’ Rubio tells Orbán ahead of Hungary polls
summary_full: Hungarians will vote in legislative elections on 12 April. Polls suggest Orbán's Fidesz party is trailing opposition leader Peter Magyar's TISZA
summary_public: Hungarians will vote in legislative elections on 12 April. Polls suggest Orbán's Fidesz party is trailing opposition leader Peter Magyar's TISZA

HU.label: mixed
HU.evidence: Orbán's Fidesz party is trailing opposition leader Peter Magyar's TISZA
